metadata.name: The Sunrise
metadata.description:
It felt like she'd seen this sunrise a thousand times already, but that couldn't be right. She was sure this was the first time her skin had ever made contact with that which they called a 'sun'. She tried to recall, in the deepest parts of her memories, when she'd ever seen something like this before. A name passed by her mind, the visage of a person who burned bright; who looked like counting birds against the midday sun personified.

2000 x 3000 px
collector will receive .jpeg file + bid gift + airdropped the collector's gift which includes unlockable content (the .psd file used to make this which consists of 95+ layers and a snippet of the character's story)

(all bidders will receive a bid gift)
